text: Wash each tomato. Make sure to rinse the tomato well. Cut each tomato in half straight down the middle.  Scoop out the insides with the spoon. Be careful not to rip the tomato. Add the mozzarella cheese in the bowl. Now add the Gorgonzola cheese. Put the goat cheese in the freezer for about 10 to 20 minutes.  Add the scallops. get out the bread crumbs and basil flakes. Add a dash (sprinkle) of basil flakes. Add the bread crumbs. Mix it all together with your clean hands. Scoop the mixture with your ice cream scooper into each tomato. Go back and refill if you have more mixture. Add 1 to 2 slices of goat cheese on top of the tomato.  Bake in the oven for 20 to 30 minutes. Enjoy!
